author: wn.com
title: IWitness Partners with Facing History and Ourselves (USC Shoah Foundation)
text: ( Source : USC Shoah Foundation ) USC Shoah Foundation and Facing History and Ourselves have established a partnership in order to develop meaningful and engaging learning resources centered on Holocaust survivor testimonies. Facing History
